name: Shreyas Barve
content: When you look at Japanese traditional architecture, you have to look at Japanese culture and its relationship with nature. You can actually live in a harmonious, close contact with nature – this very unique to Japan. It is the most intoxicating place for me. The Japanese culture fascinates me: the food, the dress, the manners and the traditions. It’s the travel experience that has moved me the most. It never considers time together as time wasted. Rather, it is time invested. – Donald Richie

name: Rishabh
content: Python is a great programming language for Machine Learning as well as Data Science. It is also very easy to learn than most other programming languages in the market.
